channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 20:25 Alarm lifted in Vinnytsia region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 20:25 Alarm lifted in Vinnytsia region. Follow further messages. #Vinnytsia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
